com.eryansky.common.utils
类 ThreadUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.eryansky.common.utils.ThreadUtils

public class ThreadUtils
extends java.lang.Object

线程相关的Utils函数集合.

作者：
尔演&Eryan eryanwcp@gmail.com

嵌套类摘要
static class ThreadUtils.CustomizableThreadFactory
          自定义ThreadFactory,可定制线程池的名称.
 
构造方法摘要
ThreadUtils()
           
 
方法摘要
static void gracefulShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool, int shutdownTimeout, int shutdownNowTimeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
          按照ExecutorService JavaDoc示例代码编写的Graceful Shutdown方法.
static void normalShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool, int timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
          直接调用shutdownNow的方法.
static void sleep(long millis)
          sleep等待,单位毫秒,忽略InterruptedException.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

ThreadUtils

public ThreadUtils()
方法详细信息

sleep

public static void sleep(long millis)
sleep等待,单位毫秒,忽略InterruptedException.

gracefulShutdown

public static void gracefulShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool,
                                    int shutdownTimeout,
                                    int shutdownNowTimeout,
                                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
按照ExecutorService JavaDoc示例代码编写的Graceful Shutdown方法. 先使用shutdown尝试执行所有任务. 超时后调用shutdownNow取消在workQueue中Pending的任务,并中断所有阻塞函数. 另对在shutdown时线程本身被调用中断做了处理.

参数：
shutdownNowTimeout -

normalShutdown

public static void normalShutdown(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool,
                                  int timeout,
                                  java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
直接调用shutdownNow的方法.
